Description: 
-------------- 
Become a fearless cabbie in the city of London. Tests will have to overcome various destinations such as Trafalgar Square, Big Ben and Hyde Park. With a great approach to the style of Sega's Crazy Taxi, this title must collect customers and take within a time limit to their destination, but in the city of London. A realistic environment for which authentic planes used in the city of London with a faithful representation of London Cabs
